detail_desc: Choker of thin metal chain with letter pendants. Adjustable length, 28-36 cm.
Joggers in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets. Narrow, decorative piping down the legs and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Espadrilles with a braided jute trim around the soles. Rubber soles. Platform 3 cm.
Lace thong briefs with a low waist, lined gusset,wide sides and string back.
Tops in soft cotton jersey with a racer back and elastic hem.
Reversible sun hat in soft jersey, one side with an all-over print and the other in a solid colour. Ties under the chin. Width of brim 3.5 cm.
T-shirt in soft viscose jersey with a motif on the front.
Sleeveless jumpsuit in a soft weave with a zip at the top,elasticated drawstring waist, chest pockets, side pockets and one leg pocket. Tapered legs with seams at the knees and elasticated hems.
Dungaree shorts in a cotton weave with press-studs at the sides and concealed press-studs at the crotch. Elastic straps with adjustable fasteners at the front, and flap leg pockets.
5-pocket, slim-fit jeans in stretch denim with a high waist, zip fly and button, and flared hems. The jeans are made partly from organic cotton.

Soft, non-wired bras in cotton jersey with lined, triangular cups that give the bust a natural shape and provide light support. Adjustable shoulder straps, concealed elastication at the hem and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Jumper in a soft, fine cotton knit with a round neck, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
5-pocket trousers in washed, slightly stretchy twill with a regular waist, zip fly and skinny legs. Skinny fit.
Cycling shorts in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Suit trousers in woven fabric with a high waist, hook-and-eye fasteners and zip fly. Side pockets and straight, wide legs.
Metal hoop earrings. Diameter 4 cm.
Short, fine-knit socks designed to be hidden by your shoes with a silicone trim at the back of the heel to keep them in place.
Fitted, calf-length dress in ribbed viscose jersey with a V-neck, narrow shoulder straps and a slit at the back.
Short, pleated skirt in woven fabric with a high waist and belt with a metal buckle. Unlined.
Short, straight-cut dress in soft jersey with a boat neck, 3/4-length sleeves and pockets in the side seams.
Sleeveless blouse in crinkled viscose with an opening and button at the back of the neck and frills at the sides. Lace-trimmed gathered seam at the top and an asymmetric hem.
Slingbacks in crocodile-patterned imitation leather with square toes, an adjustable heel strap and metal buckle at one side. Imitation leather linings and insoles.
Sunglasses with plastic frames and UV-protective, tinted lenses.
Linen joggers with a regular, elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, a fake back pocket and tapered legs.
Hat in a soft cable knit with a large faux fur pompom at the top. Lined.
Chinos in a cotton weave with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, diagonal side pockets and a fake jetted back pocket.
Dress in lightweight, patterned twill with a collar, buttons down the front and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Gathered seam at the waist and a flared skirt. Unlined.

Short dress in woven fabric with a round neckline trimmed with a decorative, embroidered band. V-neck opening at the front with twisted ties at the top and long sleeves with smocked cuffs. Gathered seam with a small frill trim at the waist and a skirt with a flounced hem. Unlined.

Dress in soft sweatshirt fabric with an embroidered motif at the top, long sleeves, twisted seams at the front and side pockets. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem and short slits at the hem. Slightly longer at the back. Soft brushed inside. The dress is made partly from recycled cotton.
Top in crinkled jersey with long sleeves and a gently draped, wrapover back.
Dress in lightweight, patterned twill with a collar, buttons down the front and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Gathered seam at the waist and a flared skirt. Unlined.
High-waisted shorts in cotton seersucker with a zip fly and concealed hook-and-eye fastener. Detachable tie belt, patch front pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Polo-neck jumper in a cotton knit with long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Short, fitted dress in an airy crêpe weave with a V-neck, wrapover front with off-centre buttons, long sleeves and a gently flared skirt. Unlined.
Fully lined, patterned bikini top in a narrow cut at the top with narrow shoulder straps and an elasticated hem.
Fitted top in sturdy, ribbed cotton jersey with narrow shoulder straps.
Trainer socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops. Three pairs with a motif on the top of the foot.
Leggings in patterned jersey with an elasticated waist.
Cardboard photo booth masks in various designs with a plastic stick.
Jumper in a fine, fluffy knit with long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline and hem.
Top in a softly draping weave with a V-neck front and back and spaghetti shoulder straps. Lined. The polyester content of the top is partly recycled.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric with an embroidered motif and tassels in a relaxed fit with dropped shoulders and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Trunks in stretch cotton jersey with flatlock seams, an elasticated waist, lined front and short legs.
Wide, cropped T-shirt in cotton jersey with a motif.

Boxy-style top in lightweight organic cotton sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders and long sleeves with elastication at the cuffs. Ribbed trim with a contrasting colour stripe around the neckline, and a drawstring at the hem. Soft brushed inside.
Soft, non-wired bra in lace with adjustable shoulder straps and padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Wide lace trim at the hem and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.

Warm-lined boots in waterproof functional fabric with imitation leather details and a padded, ankle-length shaft with a faux fur trim. Adjustable elasticated lacing at the front, a zip in the side and reflective details. Pile linings and insoles and rubber soles.

Knee-length, padded jacket in a quilted weave with a padded, stand-up collar and a detachable hood with press-studs at the front. Zip with a chin guard and a wind flap with press-studs down the front. Narrow elastication at the cuffs, diagonal welt front pockets and vents with press-studs at the sides. Lined.
Dress with a soft jersey bodice, visible zip at the back and short cap sleeves. Seam at the waist and a lined, flared skirt in a patterned weave with a sheen.
Boxy-style cardigan in a soft, textured-knit cotton blend with low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the opening, cuffs and hem. No buttons.

Ankle-length trousers in a Tencel™ lyocell-blend weave with an elasticated drawstring waist and a regular waist. Straight, gently tapering legs with contrasting-colour stripes with press-studs down the sides.
Blouse in crinkled satin with a small collar and V-neck opening with a concealed button at the front. Gathered shoulder seams, a gathered yoke at the back and long sleeves with wide, buttoned cuffs.
Sandals with adjustable hook and loop straps across the foot. Suede linings and insoles and fluted soles.
Fitted vest top in soft jersey.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey. Chest pocket with a print motif.
Kaftan-style tunic in an airy, patterned weave with a V-neck and short sleeves. Tie belt at the waist and a straight-cut hem with slits in the sides. Unlined.
LOVE STORIES x H&M. Block-coloured swimsuit in scuba fabric with a fixed elastic belt that accentuates the waist. Zip with a long tab at the back and a lined gusset.
Platform sandals in suede with a braided jute trim, an adjustable ankle strap with a metal buckle, and wedge heels. Rubber soles. Platform front 3.5 cm, heel 9.5 cm.
Spotted, flock-print tights with an elasticated waist.
Long-sleeved top in soft pile with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Shirt in airy cotton with a collar, buttons down the front, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Trousers in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist and ribbed hems.
Jumper in a soft fine-knit viscose blend with a collar, button placket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Fitted cycling shorts in glossy jersey with a high, elasticated waist.
Short top in airy, ribbed jersey with a round neck, short sleeves and a twisted detail at the hem.

Joggers in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend. Casual style in a relaxed fit with a high, elasticated, drawstring waist, diagonal welt pockets at the sides and elasticated hems. The cotton content of the joggers is partly organic.
Short-sleeved jumper in soft, fine-knit cashmere with ribbing around the neckline, sleeves and hem.
KELZUKI x H&M. Set with a hat and tube scarf in soft, patterned cotton jersey. Fleece lining.
Linen joggers with a regular, elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, a fake back pocket and tapered legs.
Joggers in sweatshirt fabric made from a soft cotton blend with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets. Legs with contrasting colour stripes down the sides and ribbed hems.

Set with a shirt and trousers in a soft cotton weave. Long-sleeved shirt with a collar and buttons down the front. Pre-tied bow tie with an elastic strap and fastener at the back. Lightly brushed trousers with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and button, and side pockets. Detachable, adjustable elastic braces.
Ballet shoes in satin with a decorative bow at the front, elastic straps that cross over the foot and concealed elastication around the opening. Linings and patterned insoles in jersey. Suede soles.
Hobo bag in grained imitation leather with a detachable adjustable shoulder strap, zip at the top and an three inner compartments, one with a zip. Lined. Size 16x30x36 cm.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Sunglasses with concealed frames and angular, UV-protective, tinted lenses.
Sturdy, soft fine-knit tights with an elasticated waist.
Hi-tops with a lightly padded edge and tongue, loop at the back, lacing at the front and a zip in one side. Pile linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Strappy, V-neck top in a plumeti viscose weave with lace details, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, buttons down the front and a tie detail at the hem.
Espadrilles in cotton with a braided jute trim around the soles and elastic gores in the sides. Canvas linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
